entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
